fdd_info.business_description: 1 Tom Plumber Global Inc. offers franchises to operate a 1-Tom-Plumber® plumbing business focused on emergency plumbing services and repairs at commercial and residential properties.
fdd_info.franchise_system_description: The franchise operates a drain cleaning and full-service plumbing business focused on emergency services and repairs for commercial and residential properties using the franchisor's system, which includes standards, trademarks, materials, and an operations manual.
fdd_info.principal_business_address: 24 Whitney Drive, Suite B, Milford, Ohio 45150
